nodes.text: Shonbla was a male Human archaeologist who lived during the Cold War with the Sith Empire.
Shonbla worked as an archaeologist during the Cold War, and had a shop aboard Carrick Station. An expert in archaeology, Shonbla would lend his expertise to any passing archaeologist.
Shonbla appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as an Archaeology crew skill trainer aboard Carrick Station.
